candidates.name: Brent Maru
candidates.why_elect: As Mayor I will represent and reflect your aspirations with the utmost of integrity and transparency. My success throughout the region has demanded of me a high level of business acumen, the ability to negotiate significant contracts, understand local and central government complexities, and work with challenging budgets.
candidates.why_stand: Proud to call Motueka home, I am extremely grateful every day for the vast experiences my family, wife—Jody, daughter—Tiegan and son—Brodie have at their fingertips with this district. I have dedicated my life to service and get great satisfaction in working for our community.

candidates.name: Dean McNamara
candidates.why_elect: I have many generations of working class history in Tasman. I would like to see us return to the "good old days" when anyone prepared to work hard could make a go of it. My background in running my own businesses gives me good understanding of how every dollar counts.
candidates.why_stand: I think Tasman is terrific! And everyone wants to live here. But, unfortunately, the Tasman lifestyle is out of most people's budgets. Wages are too low and the cost of living is too high for most young families and retirees. You deserve better representation to address the inequality in Tasman.

candidates.name: Tim King
candidates.why_elect: A willingness to work constructively across a wide range of interests to reach positive outcomes. Governance experience in business, community organisations and council. Strong connections across the region with urban and rural communities. A track record of making the hard decisions when required. Understanding the challenges and opportunities for Tasman.
candidates.why_stand: We love living and raising our family in the Tasman region and I believe the mix of governance experience and community involvement that I have enables me to create a constructive council environment and deliver positive outcomes for our community.
